titles.title: A bill to permanently reauthorize the Land and Water Conservation Fund.
A bill to permanently reauthorize the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to make permanent the authorization for the Land and Water Conservation Fund. The greater of 1.5% of the annual authorized funding amount or $10 million shall be used for projects that secure recreational public access to existing federal public land for hunting, fishing, and other recreational purposes.
